data.text: @realrogerboyce @nzherald Omg that's beyond disgusting he should be charged criminally for threatening to harm a minor at the very least! Despicable human being!
@factchekka @lululbs @nzherald Grow the fcuk up mate...were you there?...or just another gutless armchair hack...

@nzherald The rest of his generation from now on will remember and be ashamed of this. Apart from Labour voters who can’t see child poverty growth, mental health, attempt suicide, violent crimes, inflation, mismanagement of taxpayer money, everything grew. But Labour lovers can’t see it!

@bukster1965 @nzherald It's disgusting. Those people are there because they have been forced out of jobs and society. There should be no mandates snd no hating your meighbour even if sanctioned and encouraged by the Prime Minster.
@nzherald As will we, @NZPCommissioner. As will we.
@lululbs @nzherald It’s just a fact. Even the police were saying they felt sorry for many of the protesters who were mentally ill and easily manipulated.

@nzherald So Jacinda's Private Eviction squad is a reality? Way for the Commissioner to lose the respect of a large portion of NZs public. How many NZ Police will leave in shame? Who will still trust the NZ Police to be their "friend" ?
